TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AppearanceEditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart
Public NotInheritable Class AppearanceEditorPart Inherits EditorPart

summary.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated control.

span.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別是衍生自的編輯器控制項類別，並會用來編輯影響的相關聯之外觀的內容或其他伺服器控制項。The class is an editor control that derives from the class, and is used to edit properties that affect the appearance of an associated or other server control. 控制項可讓終端使用者編輯有幾項 UI 屬性控制項。The control enables end users to edit several UI properties of a control. 會出現在頁面，即可編輯每個屬性值的控制項類型被列在下表的相鄰資料格。The type of control that appears in the page to edit each property value is listed in the adjacent cell of the following table. |屬性Property|用來編輯屬性的控制項Control used to edit property| |--------------|-----------------------------------| ||A控制項用來設定標題的文字。A control is used to set the text for the title.| ||A控制項用來選取使用何種類型的標題和框線選項。A control is used to select what type of title-and-border option is used.| ||A控制項用來選取在頁面上的內容流動的方向。A control is used to select the direction that content flows on the page.| ||A控制項用來設定高度的編號和控制項用來選取單位。A control is used to set a number for the height, and a control is used to select the units.| ||A控制項用來設定高度的編號和控制項用來選取單位。A control is used to set a number for the height, and a control is used to select the units.| ||A控制項用來指出是否隱藏此控制項。A control is used to indicate whether the control is hidden.| 控制項隨即顯示，只有在 Web 組件頁面處於編輯模式，且時特定已選取要編輯的控制項。The control becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific control has been selected for editing. 控制項，如同所有其他控制，位於區域。The control, like all other controls, resides in an zone. > [!IMPORTANT] > 只能包含區域控制項和控制項不能放在任何其他類型的區域。An zone can contain only controls, and controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone. 類別具有的最少的屬性。The class has a minimal set of properties. 屬性用來取得或設定顯示控制項時，會顯示為標題的字串。The property is used to get or set a string that is displayed as a title when the control is visible. 屬性會設定 [繼承] 屬性從控制，以便預設控制項接收焦點內控制項是基底中的預設值與相同控制項。The property sets the inherited property from the control, so that the default control that receives the focus within the control is the same as the default in the base control. 類別也有兩個重要的方法。The class also has two important methods. 方法會覆寫基底方法，從類別。The method overrides the base method from the class. 這個方法很重要，因為它可讓您取得的屬性值控制項，它會編輯，並將它們指派給編輯器控制項中的欄位。This method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the control it is editing and assigning them to the fields in the editor control. 方法也很重要，因為它會使用在編輯控制項中，使用者所設定的值，並更新正在編輯的控制項上的那些屬性值。The method is also important, because it takes the values set by the user in the editing controls, and updates those property values on the control being edited. 在大部分情況下控制項應該使用頁面持續性格式，藉由宣告``元素內``元素，又包含由``網頁上的項目。In most cases the control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `` element inside a `` element, which is in turn contained by an `` element on a Web page. 若要編輯其他屬性和行為控制項，您可以使用其他提供 Web 組件控制項集合的控制項。To edit other properties and behavior of controls, you can use the other controls supplied with the Web Parts control set. 這些控制項包括、 ，而。These controls include the , the , and the . 提供控制項應該提供編輯所需的大部分編輯功能控制項，但您也可以建立自訂編輯器控制項繼承自類別。The supplied controls should provide most editing features required to edit controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the class. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。For a code example, see the class overview topic. > [!NOTE] > 若要改善存取範圍，內呈現控制項`
`項目。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`項目群組的一組相關的使用中進行編輯的控制項控制項，並有助於索引標籤式瀏覽這些控制項的視覺效果 （例如，一般的網頁瀏覽器） 和語音導向使用者代理程式之間 （例如螢幕助讀軟體）。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 根據預設，此控制項呈現標記可能不符合協助工具標準，例如網頁內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告控制在網頁上，並讓它編輯有幾項 UI 屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declare an control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a control. 程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 網頁包含控制項和控制項，以及自訂的參考控制項。A Web page that contains an control and an control, along with a reference to a custom control. - 包含自訂的類別控制項。A class that contains a custom control. - 當您載入瀏覽器中的，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 使用者控制項的原始程式碼來自另一個主題。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 對於程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要取得的使用者控制項的.ascx 檔案[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主題，並放置在.aspx 頁面，在此程式碼範例中的相同資料夾中的檔案。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含的宣告式參考控制項和子系``包含宣告式參考的項目控制項。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains declarative references to an control. 此外，頁面會參考自訂控制，請使用`Register`指示詞的組件，而``控制項項目。Also, the page references the custom control, using a `Register` directive for the assembly, and the `` element for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/CS/appearanceeditorpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/VB/appearanceeditorpartvb.aspx#1)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是自訂名為類別`TextDisplayWebPart`，參考網頁中。The third part of the code example is a custom class named `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式控制項切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**，編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 顯示編輯的 UI 時，您可以看到控制項。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control. 如果您進行一些變更中編輯 UI 按一下**套用** 按鈕，您可以使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式，並查看完整的編輯變更影響的下拉式清單。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是關鍵的方法上控制項。The method is a critical method on a control. 當使用者按一下按鈕，表示確定或編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 中套用動詞命令時呼叫。It is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI). 方法的目的是要儲存的使用者已設定的值中相關聯的對應屬性的控制項控制項。The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on an control to the corresponding properties in the associated control. 參考相關聯的控制項中繼承屬性。The associated control is referenced in the inherited property. 方法會嘗試設定下列的屬性相關聯控制項：The method attempts to set the following properties on the associated control: - - - - - -

exception.span: An error occurs when setting the value for any of the following properties on the control that is being edited:

span.span: An error occurs when setting the value for any of the following properties on the control that is being edited:

summary.span: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.

span.span: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.

value.span: 字串，其中包含識別碼預設焦點在控制項控制項。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control that receives the default focus in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: Retrieves the property values from a control and assigns them to the associated control.

span.span: Retrieves the property values from a control and assigns them to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是關鍵的方法上控制項。The method is a critical method on an control. 它會實作基底類別的方法會擷取目前的值從相關聯控制項，然後更新中的控制項具有這些值，讓使用者編輯控制項。It implements the method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated control, and updates the controls in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 方法呼叫時中相關聯的值控制項可能已變更。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 如控制項，區域，其中包含控制呼叫方法，使中的值控制項一律中相關聯的值與同步控制項。For an control, the zone that contains the control calls the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control. 另一種情況其中方法呼叫時控制項進入編輯模式。Another case where the method is called is when a control is entering edit mode.

span.para: Web 組件控制項集合呼叫內繼承方法方法，因此，如果使用者之後所發生的任何變更上次檢視之前編輯控制項 （例如，共用的系統管理使用者變更控制項的會影響所有使用者），在編輯程序期間，這些變更會是明顯。如果您建立自訂控制項，您可以依照相同方式，並呼叫中繼承方法方法，以確保任何中介的變更會同步處理，但不需要執行這項操作。

The Web Parts control set calls the method within the inherited method, so that if any changes occurred after the user last viewed the control prior to editing (for example, a shared administrative user made changes to the control that would affect all users), those changes would be evident during the editing process. If you create a custom control, you can follow the same approach, and call the method from the inherited method to ensure that any intervening changes are synchronized, but it is not necessary to do this.

.property instance string Title
Public Overrides Property Title As String

summary.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

span.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

value.span: 字串，做為控制項的標題。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 預設值是由 Web 組件控制項集合提供計算的控制項名稱。

span.span: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值會顯示在標題列控制控制項時顯示在編輯模式。The property value is displayed in the title bar of an control when the control is visible in edit mode. 控制項在頁面中宣告時，您可以設定的值`Title`屬性。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute. 如果您未提供標題的值，特定文化特性的預設值用來描述這個控制項可讓使用者編輯的屬性類型。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kinds of properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 程式碼範例示範如何設定標題中頁面的持續性格式時``頁面中宣告的項目。The code example shows how to set the title in page persistence format when the `` element is declared in a page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/CS/appearanceeditorpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_AppearanceEditorPart_Overview/VB/appearanceeditorpartvb.aspx#2)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**，編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到控制項的自訂標題。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the control's custom title.
